item.description:
Lets all go to City Sports Grille at Spare Time Bowling For the FINALS of Maine's Funniest Comic Contest.

Tickets are only $5. and $1 for the meetup (tickets are normally $10-$12. ~ but this comedy show will have a twist)...at the beginning of the comedy show there will be 40 minutes of comics battling it out for the title of Maine's Funniest Comic...this is the final night of the contest and your vote counts!

Please arrive at 7:30pm so we can all meetup, sit together and have appetizers and drinks before the comedy show.

The Comedian headliner that will be performing is Paul Hunt.

I hope to see you all there!!

Also, I will be hosting the comedy show!

ALL MEETUPS Policy
Please remember, RSVP yes only if you plan to attend an event to allow us to plan accordingly. If you RSVP yes and change your mind on attending, you MUST provide at least 24 hours notice or you will be considered a "No Show". After 5 "No Shows", you will no longer be able to attend meetup events.
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation will be under Tammy in the City Sports Grille in Spare Time Bowling (formaly know as Yankee Lanes)
item.name: Appetizers & Comedy Night @ Yankee Lanes Portland in the City Sports Grille
